sn55.35:1.1: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, devanam devapadani avisuddhanam sattanam visuddhiya apariyodatanam sattanam pariyodapanaya.
sn55.35:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.35:2.3: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.35:2.8: Na ca kho panaham kinci byabadhemi tasam va thavaram va.
sn55.35:2.10: Idam pathamam devanam devapadam avisuddhanam sattanam visuddhiya apariyodatanam sattanam pariyodapanaya.
sn55.35:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.35:4.6: Na kho panaham kinci byabadhemi tasam va thavaram va.
sn55.35:4.8: Idam catuttham devanam devapadam avisuddhanam sattanam visuddhiya apariyodatanam sattanam pariyodapanaya.
sn55.35:4.9: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari devanam devapadani avisuddhanam sattanam visuddhiya apariyodatanam sattanam pariyodapanaya”ti.
